verses.verse: On that night<WH3915> could not<WH5074> the king<WH4428> sleep<WH8142>; and he commanded<WH559> to bring<WH935> the book<WH5612> of records<WH2146> of the chronicles<WH1697>, and they were read<WH7121> before<WH6440> the king<WH4428>.

And it was found<WH4672> written<WH3789>, that Mordecai<WH4782> had told<WH5046> of Bigthana<WH904> and Teresh<WH8657>, two<WH8147> of the king<WH4428>'s chamberlains<WH5631>, of those that kept<WH8104> the threshold<WH5592>, who had sought<WH1245> to lay<WH7971> hands<WH3027> on the king<WH4428> Ahasuerus<WH325>.

And the king<WH4428> said<WH559>, What honor<WH3366> and dignity<WH1420> hath been bestowed<WH6213> on Mordecai<WH4782> for this<WH559>? Then said the king<WH4428>'s servants<WH5288> that ministered<WH8334> unto him<WH1697>, There is nothing done for him<WH6213>.

And the king<WH4428> said<WH559>, Who is in the court<WH2691>? Now Haman<WH2001> was come<WH935> into the outward<WH2435> court<WH2691> of the king<WH4428>'s house<WH1004>, to speak<WH559> unto the king<WH4428> to hang<WH8518> Mordecai<WH4782> on the gallows<WH6086> that he had prepared for him<WH3559>.
And the king<WH4428>'s servants<WH5288> said<WH559> unto him<WH2001>, Behold, Haman standeth<WH5975> in the court<WH2691>. And the king<WH4428> said<WH559>, Let him come in<WH935>.

So Haman<WH2001> came in<WH935>. And the king<WH4428> said<WH559> unto him<WH6213>, What shall be done unto the man<WH376> whom the king<WH4428> delighteth<WH2654> to honor<WH3366>? Now Haman<WH2001> said<WH559> in his heart<WH3820>, To whom would the king<WH4428> delight<WH2654> to do<WH6213> honor<WH3366> more than to myself<WH3148>?
And Haman<WH2001> said<WH559> unto the king<WH4428>, For the man<WH376> whom the king<WH4428> delighteth<WH2654> to honor<WH3366>,

let royal<WH4438> apparel<WH3830> be brought<WH935> which the king<WH4428> useth to wear<WH3847>, and the horse<WH5483> that the king<WH4428> rideth<WH7392> upon<WH7218>, and on the head of which a crown<WH3804> royal<WH4438> is set<WH5414>:

and let the apparel<WH3830> and the horse<WH5483> be delivered<WH5414> to the hand<WH3027> of one<WH376> of the king<WH4428>'s most noble<WH6579> princes<WH8269>, that they may array<WH3847> the man<WH376> therewith whom the king<WH4428> delighteth<WH2654> to honor<WH3366>, and cause him to ride<WH7392> on horseback<WH5483> through the street<WH7339> of the city<WH5892>, and proclaim<WH7121> before<WH6440> him<WH6213>, Thus shall it be done to the man<WH376> whom the king<WH4428> delighteth<WH2654> to honor<WH3366>.

Then the king<WH4428> said<WH559> to Haman<WH2001>, Make haste<WH4116>, and take<WH3947> the apparel<WH3830> and the horse<WH5483>, as thou hast said<WH1696>, and do<WH6213> even so to Mordecai<WH4782> the Jew<WH3064>, that sitteth<WH3427> at the king<WH4428>'s gate<WH8179>: let nothing<WH1697> fail<WH5307> of all that thou hast spoken<WH1696>.

Then took<WH3947> Haman<WH2001> the apparel<WH3830> and the horse<WH5483>, and arrayed<WH3847> Mordecai<WH4782>, and caused him to ride<WH7392> through the street<WH7339> of the city<WH5892>, and proclaimed<WH7121> before<WH6440> him<WH6213>, Thus shall it be done unto the man<WH376> whom the king<WH4428> delighteth<WH2654> to honor<WH3366>.
And Mordecai<WH4782> came again<WH7725> to the king<WH4428>'s gate<WH8179>. But Haman<WH2001> hasted<WH1765> to his house<WH1004>, mourning<WH57> and having his head<WH7218> covered<WH2645>.

And Haman<WH2001> recounted<WH5608> unto Zeresh<WH2238> his wife<WH802> and all his friends<WH157> everything that had befallen<WH7136> him<WH559>. Then said his wise men<WH2450> and Zeresh<WH2238> his wife<WH802> unto him<WH4782>, If Mordecai, before<WH6440> whom thou hast begun<WH2490> to fall<WH5307>, be of the seed<WH2233> of the Jews<WH3064>, thou shalt not prevail<WH3201> against him<WH5307>, but shalt surely fall<WH5307> before him<WH6440>.

While they were yet talking<WH1696> with him<WH5060>, came the king<WH4428>'s chamberlains<WH5631>, and hasted<WH926> to bring<WH935> Haman<WH2001> unto the banquet<WH4960> that Esther<WH635> had prepared<WH6213>.
